scripts.watch: for pkg in $(ls packages); do if [[ "$pkg" != "fetch" && "$pkg" != "react-native-compat" && "$pkg" != "locale" && "$pkg" != "uws" ]]; then npm run watch --workspace=packages/$pkg & fi done; wait
scripts.build: npm run build --prefix packages/crc32c && npm run build --prefix packages/schema && npm run build --prefix packages/db && npm run build --prefix packages/functions && npm run build --prefix packages/errors && npm run build --prefix packages/server && npm run build --prefix packages/client && npm run build --prefix packages/data-record && npm run build --prefix packages/schema-diagram && npm run build --prefix packages/type-gen && npm run build --prefix packages/react
scripts.build-release-debug: npm run build-podman && npm run build-locale && (cd packages/crc32c && npm run build) && (cd packages/schema && npm run build) && (cd packages/db && npm run build-release-debug)
scripts.build-release: npm run build-podman && npm run build-locale && (cd packages/crc32c && npm run build) && (cd packages/schema && npm run build) && (cd packages/db && npm run build-release)
